big name.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a famous person or group, especially a musician, actor etc
big name.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Poor attendance at the concert was put down to the lack of big names.
big name.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a very well-known person, company, product etc
big name.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The company has already signed up some big names to provide the content for its news service.
The plan is supported by some of the biggest names in the US auto industry.
